{{Infobox evolution item |name = White DNA |image = [[File:White DNA.png|200px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''White DNA''. |price = N/A |location =
*[[Dragonspiral Tower]] }} ==Description== The '''White DNA''' is a type of [[Evolution Items|Evolution Item]] that is first encountered in the [[Unova]] Region. ==Uses== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | [[File:Kyurem.png|40px]] Kyurem || [[File:Kyurem (White).png|40px]] Kyurem White |} == Acquisition == {{ItemPrice/head‎|Evolution items}} {{ItemPrice|[[Dragonspiral Tower]]|N/A}} |} |} White DNA is a [[Rare_Hold_Items|Rare Hold Item]] drop from the Dungeon Boss Reshiram.
Using the Item magnet increases the chances of obtaining the item from it's base chance of 1/15 to 1/10.
{{Evolution Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Evolution Items]]
revision.comment: making it more obvious White DNA is a rare hold item drop.
